        Constructs a new controller
        Parameters:
        queue - queue to add messages to
        view - game screen to update
        model - model of inner game mechanics

        Parameters:

                    throws MancalaException

        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Throws:

      • getClient

        public Client getClient()
        Get a reference to the client used to communicate with the server
        Returns:
        client reference to client object

      • setup

        public void setup​(SetupInfo info)
        Sets game type and network information. This should only be called once because it also gives the view a new Client and creates the client/server class if needed
        Parameters:
        info - information about the kind of game that will be run

      • sendEventAsClient

        public void sendEventAsClient​(Message m)
        Sends the message to Client object so it can communicate with the server
        Parameters:
        m - message with game state

      • sendEventAsServer

        public void sendEventAsServer​(Message m)
        Sends the message to Server object so it can communicate with the client
        Parameters:
        m - message with game state

      • getServer

        public Server getServer()
        Returns a reference to the server
        Returns:
        server to communicate with the client with

      • getGameType

        public int getGameType()
        Returns game type. Synchronized to ensure it returns correct value
        Returns:
        current gameType

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
        Disconnects server and client sockets
